skillDetails.name: Optimal Performance
skillDetails.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Constructs in your party receive 10% less damage and are 10% more resistant to Debuffs.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Constructs in your party receive 10% less damage and are 10% more resistant to Debuffs.
